Name: Transfer of general vending licenses.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the transfer of general vending licenses.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Consumer Affairs
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.   Section 20-464 of the Administrative Code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new subdivision e to read as follows:
e. Notwithstanding subdivisions c and d of this section, the commissioner may, in his or her discretion, transfer a license to a dependent husband, wife, domestic partner or child of an incapacitated or deceased person to whom the license was issued under this subchapter
Â§2.  This local law shall become effective immediately.
